oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial photograph of North Nashville, ca. 1968
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aerial photograph of a portion of North Nashville, in the Buena Vista neighborhood, looking southwest, circa 1968, taken by Metro Photographer William M. King. Shows residential area with many houses visible. Streets identified on the photograph include: Arthur Avenue, 11th Avenue North, and Heiman Street. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.

Interstate 265 would pass near this location when it was built between 1968 and 1971. In this vicinity, it joined Interstate 40 in a major interchange, composing the northwest portion of the downtown inner loop. In 2000, Interstate 265 ceased to exist, and was redesignated as part of Interstate 65.
